```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r data import, include=FALSE}
diff12 <- read_csv("~/Desktop/oh-elections-project/csv_files/diff12.csv")
diff14 <- read_csv("~/Desktop/oh-elections-project/csv_files/diff14.csv")
diff16 <- read_csv("~/Desktop/oh-elections-project/csv_files/diff14.csv")
```

```{r model 2012}
m12 <- glm(CCESminusVoterReg ~ age, data = diff12, family = gaussian())
summary(m12)
```

```{r model 2014}
m14 <- glm(CCESminusVoterReg ~ age, data = diff14, family = gaussian())
summary(m14)
```

```{r model 2016}
m16 <- glm(CCESminusVoterReg ~ age, data = diff16, family = gaussian())
summary(m16)
```
